articles.title: Hamburg
articles.image_title: Defendant Irmgard F (2ndR), a former secretary for the SS commander of the Stutthof concentration camp, is led by an employee of the forensic medical service into a courtroom of the District Court in Itzehoe, northern Germany, for the continuation of her trial on February 22, 2022. - The first woman to be prosecuted for Nazi-era crimes in decades, Irmgard F. is charged with complicity in the murder of more than 10,000 people at Stutthof camp in then occupied Poland. (Photo by Christian Charisius / POOL / AFP)
